All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
Main class
CopyFilesEditorFrame
Class CopyFilesEditorFrame is the main frame for copy file app
CopyFilesEditorFrameTest
Test klasy tworzącej główne okienko kopiowania.
CopyFilesPanel
Class CopyFilesPanel is responsible for displaying two directory chooser panels and button to start copy files process
CopyFilesPanelTest
Klasa testowa sprawdzająca panel kopiowania folderów.
DirectoryChooserPanel
 
DirectoryDataToCopy
Class DirectoryModel is model that contains required data for file copier service Based on the sourceDir param all files to copy are set in imageFilesList param.
DirectoryModelTest
Klasa testowa sprawdzająca stany folderów.
FileCopierService
The FileCopierService is used to set copy files tasks and process copy of FileCopyTask
FileCopyTask
The FileCopyTask process copy of the files from source to destination directory Class copy files with rules: file is copied to destination dir in subdirectory named as file date create metadata, file name is next number
FileCopyTasksExecutor
The FileCopyTasks is used to process copy files in separate threads Number of threads is used from the config file and read from ThreadPoolData
FileCopyTasksExecutorTest
Test class for copy files in threads
FileCopyTaskTest
Klasa testowa kopiująca plik do folderu docelowego.
StartCopyListener
The StartCopyListener implements ActionListener and it's trigger on start button being pressed, Class triggers FileCopierService In case of any error it sets message in a view label
ThreadPoolData
ThreadPoolData to read and pass set threads value in a config file
